page.title: 19Attitudes and Opinions
page.content: Many people are 'new' to the area, living in houses built in the 1960's. Most were concerned with the fact that 'Green Belt'land should not be lost to further development.An assosiation called the'Three Arrows Residents' Association'has been formed with that purpose in mind. People registered quite strong concern at the lack of pedestrian facilities on the main Bolton Road. Many were concerned with the lack of playgrounds and play areas for children in the area and wished to see swings etc. installed.Many people thought that this lack of facilities, especially for teenagers,was a primary cause of vandalism. The people interviewed for this information came from the centre of our survey block.
